text_snack_mustbenum: Darajar dole ne ta zama lamba!
text_snack_toobig: Valueimar da aka zaɓa ta yi girma sosai!
text_snack_toosmall: Valueimar da aka zaɓa ta yi ƙarami kaɗan!
text_settings_showadd: Nuna maballin "ƙara" a cikin manyan fayiloli
text_importexport_content: Anan zaku iya shigo da fitarwa bayananku.
text_error_loadfile: kuskure: ba zai iya ɗaukar fayil ba.
text_error_fileformat: kuskure: tsarin fayil ba daidai bane
text_help_content1: Bayanan kula aikace-aikace ne don adanawa da tsara bayanan kula.
text_help_content2: Don ƙirƙirar sabon bayanin kula, ko sabon fayil, latsa alamar "ƙari": zaɓi tsakanin bayanin rubutu da babban fayil, saka taken kuma ƙarshe abin da ke ciki, sannan danna adana don adana canje-canje, ko latsa share don share bayanin kula, ko dawo don tsallake canje-canje amma kiyaye bayanin kula.
text_help_content3: Latsa maballin "buɗe" kusa da bayanin kula don buɗe abubuwan da ke ciki.
text_help_content4: Latsa maballin "ƙara" a cikin babban fayil don ƙara sabon abu a ciki.
text_help_content5: Ga bayanan rubutu da manyan fayiloli, latsa maɓallin "shirya" don gyaggyara su, danna maɓallin "matsa baya" don musanya matsayi tare da ɓangaren da ya gabata, latsa maɓallin "matsa gaba" don musanya matsayi tare da na gaba, danna maballin "matsa sama" don matsar da abun daga cikin babban fayil dinda yake a halin yanzu, ko latsa maɓallin "matsa ƙasa" don matsar da ɓangaren a cikin ƙaramin fayil mai zuwa.
text_help_content6: A cikin menu na saitunan, mai sauƙi bayan danna kan gunkin "saituna", zaku iya ɓoye ko nuna gyare-gyare, motsi da maɓallan ƙari. Hakanan zaka iya saita layuka da layuka yankin rubutu don akwatin maganganun "gyara". Hakanan yana yiwuwa a sauya yaren mai amfani da shi.
text_help_content7: Don shigo ko fitarwa bayanan kula, latsa gunkin shigowa / fitarwa. Za a shigo da bayanan kula ko fitar da su a cikin fayil ɗin JSON takamaiman wannan aikace-aikacen. Lokacin shigo da bayanan daga fayil, za a share bayanan yanzu kuma a sake rubuta su.
text_help_content8: Bayanan kula sune Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizon Ci Gaban, wanda ke nufin cewa yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Lokacin da ka girka shi, yayin da ba a nuna abubuwan binciken ba, har yanzu yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Ana adana bayanan kula a cikin adreshin mai bincike don yankin bayanan.marcoparrone.com. LocalStorage na aiki lafiya tare da masu bincike na Chrome, Edge da Firefox. Wasu masu bincike zasu iya shareShagon gida bayan wani lokaci. Android ta tsoho yana amfani da Chrome, Windows ta tsoho yana amfani da Edge. Bayanan kula a halin yanzu baya tallafawa kan samfuran Apple. Tare da manufar taimakawa don hana asarar bayanin kula, ana ba da shawarar yin ajiyar ajiya ta amfani da aikin "fitarwa", duk lokacin da kuka yi wasu gyare-gyare waɗanda ba ku son rasawa.
text_about_content3: AN BAYAR DA SOFTWARE "KAMAR YADDA", BATARE DA GARANTIN KOWANE IRIN, MAGANA KO AIKI BA, HAR DA BAYA KASANCEWA DA GASKIYAR SANA'AR SAMUN KYAUTA, KYAUTA WAJEN SANA'U DA RASHIN YIN RASHI. BABU WANI ABU DA ZAI YI WA MALAMAI KO MASU KWADAYI A CIKIN KWADAYI DUK WANI LAIFI, LALACEWA KO SAURAN LAYYA, KO A HANYAR KWAQIQI, TAUYA KO WATA, DA TA FITO DAGA, WAJANTA KO TA HADAWA DA SOFTWARE KO AMFANI KO SAURAN MAGANA SOFTWARE.
text_about_content4: WANNAN HIDIMAR NA KUNSAN FASSARA DA GOOGLE YAYI MAKA. GOOGLE YAYI FADA DA DUKKAN GARANTI DANGANE DA FASSARA, FAHIMTAR KO TA HANYAR, TARE DA KOWANE GARANTI NA INGANTAKA, AMINCI, DA KOWANE GARANTI NA HARKAR MAGANA, KYAUTA A BANGAREN SANA'A
text_about_content5: An fassara wannan ƙa'idodin yanar gizon don saukakawarku ta amfani da software na fassarar da Google Translate ke bayarwa. Anyi ƙoƙari mai ma'ana don samar da ingantacciyar fassara, kodayake, babu fassarar atomatik mai kyau kuma ba ana nufin maye gurbin masu fassarar ɗan adam ba. An bayar da fassarori a matsayin sabis ga masu amfani da gidan yanar gizon marcoparrone.com, kuma ana bayar da su "kamar yadda yake." Babu wani garantin kowane iri, ko dai an bayyana ko a bayyane, da aka yi game da daidaito, aminci, ko daidaito na duk fassarar da aka yi daga Ingilishi zuwa kowane yare. Wasu abubuwan ciki (kamar su hotuna, bidiyo, Filashi, da sauransu) maiyuwa baza a fassara su daidai ba saboda iyakance software na fassarar.
text_about_content6: Rubutun aikin hukuma shine shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi. Duk wani bambancin ra'ayi ko bambance-bambance da aka kirkira a cikin fassarar ba abin ɗaurawa bane kuma ba shi da wani tasiri na doka don bin doka ko dalilai na tilastawa. Idan wasu tambayoyi sun taso dangane da daidaiton bayanin da ke cikin gidan yanar gizon da aka fassara, koma zuwa shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi wanda shine fasalin hukuma.
